Articles.Content:
(Beams back to Discovery)

I can sense another fleet. The computer says that the next wave will be here in a couple of hours.

> 
> [Holy CRAP. I went away for 13 minutes, and now this nonsese. Where am I at this point?]

you are MIA

> 
> [Holy CRAP. I went away for 13 minutes, and now this nonsese. Where am I at this point?]

The Citadel is under attack by an AI fleet, Dark got shot (again), there's more ships coming.

[so I was left behind while you guys fight someone? I'm gonna go with that if nothing else]

Sir, let me help! Use my sidearm to help with boarding parties! \*Tosses sidearm over\*

We need to go back....

Back to the Multiverse!

> 
> (Beams back to Discovery)
> I can sense another fleet. The computer says that the next wave will be here in a couple of hours.

Okay, get down here, I'm going to need some backup while I bring the weapon system online, they caught us off guard the first time, but THIS time we'll be ready.

> 
> [so I was left behind while you guys fight someone? I'm gonna go with that if nothing else]

You're still hiding on Sampa's ship.

- - - Updated - - -

We should get Xannari to help!

- - - Updated - - -

We should hack the AI and replace it with a friendly version. Get me a hacker!

> 
> [so I was left behind while you guys fight someone? I'm gonna go with that if nothing else]
> Sir, let me help! Use my sidearm to help with boarding parties! \*Tosses sidearm over\*

(More like went missing while we were busy dealing with pirates.)

Thanks...\*I think I've seen this person before...well, won't look a gift horse in the mouth\*
[Thinks to herself] Uh oh, I forget to limit the power!

I'm going to fire my phasers at the airlock to clear the boarding party. Beam to the Discovery!

(Fires Phasers)
\*thinks to himself...if this is Xannari, thank goodness we set the system up to have command codes rotated after every use\*

(Invading drones get sucked out to space)

- - - Updated - - -

(Beams up Sampa and Xannari)

> 
> I'm going to fire my phasers at the airlock to clear the boarding party. Beam to the Discovery!
> (Fires Phasers)

> 
> [Thinks to herself] Uh oh, I forget to limit the power!

Grabs "crewman" as Laythe blows airlock, hang on...
that was close
You are halfway out to space as you get beamed aboard
you, come with me, we still need to get the stations internal security online.

Thank you, sir. Do you want me to come with you? I'm sure I can find an armament somewhere to help. I can stay here to if you want.

[Good lordly loo HOW DO YOU DO THAT]
get us back down there, the internal weapon system need to be brought online

I use my sense of "reality".

That "crewman" is Xannari

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Thank you, sir. Do you want me to come with you? I'm sure I can find an armament somewhere to help. I can stay here to if you want.
> [Good lordly loo HOW DO YOU DO THAT]

Do what?

> 
> you, come with me, we still need to get the stations internal security online.

As you wish.

Computer, download status.

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹57% complete

(Shoots Xannari with stun gun.)

Take her to the Stasis room!
At this time, I could use all the help we can get...and I believe that even Xannari deserves a chance to make up for her mistakes.
[Check the text from earlier before doing anything that has already been declared impossible]

[Computer]

<kinemetic warhead="" incoming,="" detonation="" in="" 5--4--3--2--1----=""></kinemetic>
lol, thought there was something suspicious about that person
